data.Name: Gas
data.Description: The property of rock samples that allows the passage of a gas (air, nitrogen, or helium) through the body in the presence of a differential pressure and usually should be corrected for non-Darcy effects.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Klinkenberg
data.Description: Slippage-corrected gas permeability by either several measurements of gas permeability at different mean pressure and extrapolation to infinite pressure or measuring one single gas permeability and using a empirical correlation (e.g., Jones, 1987)
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Probe
data.Description: (Or Profile) Highly resolved measurements of permeability which is performed on slabbed cores especially in formations where conventional plug analysis cannot adequately capture the degree of heterogeneity
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Steady state
data.Description: A physical condition in permeability measurement in which the flow rate of fluid passing through the core sample is steady (no change with time) for a constant applied ∆P at the ends of the sample
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Unsteady state
data.Description: A physical condition in permeability measurement in which the flow rate of fluid passing through the core sample is not steady (changes with time)
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Pulse decay
data.Description: Method designed for low permeability rock samples in an as-received state resulting in a relative permeability
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Pressure decay
data.Description: A type of unsteady state gas permeability technique resulting in a maximum permeability to gas in crushed rock samples
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).
